column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////For appetizers we got the spicy park tacos
column2: sweet potato sticks and the Brussels sprouts tempura. The spicy pork tacos were very tiny
column4: very tasty. It comes with two in a plate and. The sweet potato sticks weren't worth the price and weren't very unique. The Brussels sprouts tempura was AWESOME! If you dip it in hot sauce
